column4: Using Chromium? Please vote:   http://crbug.com/38627    "Feature request: On chrome://extensions/ extension icon should link to its extension gallery page"  i.e. icons would link to https://chrome.google.com/extensions/detail/ljobjlafonikaiipfkggjbhkghgicgoh   etc
abhi: sorry. I'm looking for Chromium users running Ubuntu or other linuxes
is there a ubuntu-users community elsewhere?
#ubuntu-offtopic perhaps, but we don't appreciate spam either.
